roundEmail:
Dear Negotiator,

This email marks the beginning of round <ROUND> of the <EVENT_NAME>.

All essential details including your instructions can be found here: <PATH_LINK>

Review your instructions carefully and prepare your negotiation strategy. Please do not share your confidential instructions with your negotiation counterparts, even after the negotiations have concluded. However, feel free to share any information you deem appropriate during the negotiation process. 

Once you've reached an agreement, please submit it on Discurso.AI as soon as possible but no later than on <ROUND_END_TIME>. 

If no agreement is reached or reported by the deadline, this round will be evaluated as a no-deal. Once your agreement is submitted, you are done with this negotiation round. 

Please feel free to reach out to us at support@discurso.ai should you have any questions.

Good luck and happy negotiating!
Your Discurso.AI Team
summaryEmail:
Dear Instructor,

Round <ROUND> of your event <EVENT_NAME> has finished. Below is the summary of how all participating teams have performed in this round, you can find more information about results at <LINK> ;

<SUMMARY>


Best regards,
Your Discurso.AI Team
welcomeEmail:
Dear Negotiator,

Welcome to Discurso.AI, a science-based, interactive platform designed to help you develop and practice your negotiation skills.

We are thrilled to have you with us! To get started, please set up your account password by following the single-use link below:

<WELCOME_LINK>

If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out to us at support@discurso.ai

Happy negotiating!
Your Discurson.AI Team
